item.description:
I hope you can join us Thursday night for a FREE cocktail
at Whiskey Park in the Park Plaza Hotel.


The official event runs from 5-9pm. We can meet, grab a drink or two and the head over to another (cheaper!) location nearby if we want!


This is on the T, so stop by after work and meet both old and new members of the group!

We've partnered with LivingSocial, VeeV (the Acai Spirit) and Buyyourfriendadrink.com to put together a great evening!

To get your FREE cocktail, you *must* RSVP and print out your receipt at Buy Your Friend a VeeV.

I look forward to seeing you there! Email me if you have any questions!
item.name: FREE Cocktail at Whiskey Park
